entry.title: Dragonfly Porn
entry.content:
Dragonfly Porn

Just messing around with a new lens at the lake.  I wish I had bought the 100-400 before going to Africa.  Anyway this must be dragonfly mating season.

entry.title: OK, this is silly, but I was playing around with the GoPro yesterday to see if it would float, and the sunfish were just absolutely fascinated with it. The captions came to me on my bike ride this morning. I know, a mind is a terrible thing to waste.
entry.content: OK, this is silly, but I was playing around with the GoPro yesterday to see if it would float, and the sunfish were just absolutely fascinated with it.  The captions came to me on my bike ride this morning.  I know, a mind is a terrible thing to waste.
